top_comments_top.body:
Hello and welcome to r/LifeProTips!

Please help us decide if this post is a good fit for the subreddit by up or downvoting this comment. 

If you think that this is great advice to improve your life, please upvote. If you think this doesn't help you in any way, please downvote. If you don't care, leave it for the others to decide.

> how to make £5000 in one year without a job

Get a job.
Donating plasma and sperm/ovum, signing up for medical testing. Not sure if thise are available where youre at, but these work in the US.

Walk your country and video blog your journey. Interview interesting people you meet and upload every other day. Get sponsors along the way and viewers generate money, plus from advisors. People will let you take care of you if you yourself are interesting and genuine.
You can make it in 2 months with a job . Try counting cards lol drop shipped items
